name: Lost In Dreams (Stars Studio)
description:
A son lost in his dreams, finding his way back home.

A Short Horror Experience just for you. :)

This is my first attempt at a 3D Game. Hope you like the experience. It is still under development. Please do let me know how you feel about the game, and what all can be improved. 

TIPS 

  • Follow the voice. 
  • Follow the Light. 
  • Survive.
  • Experience the dream.
  • Multiple Endings Available in this Game

NOTE

The game is still in its early access. If you experience a few bugs, I'm sorry for it. There are bugs being fixed simultaneously. If your FPS seems low, kindly please close the game and restart it. It ran smoothly the second time on my PC.
